page.topic: Conditional style, class, text, and events
page.description: Specify if the style, class and text for this control is conditional. For example, you might want to display a control with a red background if a value in another field is within a specified range.
page.note: This calculation is performed in the Browser (i.e. on the 'client side') using Javascript.
